user_profiles.name: ip only
user_profiles.description: if only the ip of the request is known

user_profiles.name: username selected
user_profiles.description: the user has selected and reserved a unique username

user_profiles.name: email verified
user_profiles.description: the email of the account has been confirmed

user_profiles.name: user creator
user_profiles.description: for system users that can only create new users and do system based profile upgrades up to email verified

user_profiles.name: system link
user_profiles.description: for technical accounts for external but trustworthy systems

user_profiles.name: bot
user_profiles.description: an internal automated job that does changes in the database

user_profiles.name: human identity
user_profiles.description: it is confirmed that this user is a human e.g. by the passport

user_profiles.name: publisher
user_profiles.description: humans that have the permission to confirm changes in the general setup

user_profiles.name: voter
user_profiles.description: a human that have voting rights for the higher profile levels such as bureaucrat or admin

user_profiles.name: link admin
user_profiles.description: humans that have the permissions to maintain a system link / reference

user_profiles.name: bureaucrat
user_profiles.description: humans that have the permissions e.g. to confirm the human identity check; a bureaucrat cannot have any other permission that a human can have being a bureaucrat

user_profiles.name: admin
user_profiles.description: administrator that can add and change verbs and sees the code_id; a admin cannot have any other permission that a human can have being an admin

user_profiles.name: juror
user_profiles.description: humans that have right to decide a case with at least one judge that have brought to cord by any other human

user_profiles.name: developer
user_profiles.description: Can see all errors and change the status of the errors, but cannot access the production and user acceptance test systems; a developer cannot have any other permission that a human can have being a developer

user_profiles.name: judge
user_profiles.description: humans that have right to decide a case that have brought to cord by any other human; a judge cannot have any other permission that a human can have being judge

user_profiles.name: system test
user_profiles.description: for integration tests that should never be shown to the user but is used to check if integration test data is completely removed after the tests

user_profiles.name: benevolent dictator
user_profiles.description: a fallback admin user for unexpected cases; hopefully never used

user_profiles.name: system
user_profiles.description: User to log internal tasks not directly initiated by an user like system testing and cleanup

phrase_types.name: standard
phrase_types.description: for words that have need no special behaviour

phrase_types.name: time
phrase_types.description: A time word defines the time period for which a value is valid and values with a time can be used to display time series.

phrase_types.name: measure type
phrase_types.description: a measure word such as meter, kilogram, ...

phrase_types.name: time jump
phrase_types.description: these terms describes a change of a timestamp term

phrase_types.name: calc
phrase_types.description: a calculated word in R; e.g. this year returns always a different term

phrase_types.name: format percent
phrase_types.description: terms that forces the result to be formatted in percent

phrase_types.name: scaling
phrase_types.description: a scaling word such as millions, one, ...

phrase_types.name: hidden scaling
phrase_types.description: "one" is needed as a scaling word for correct calculations, but it is not useful to display it

phrase_types.name: view / layer
phrase_types.description:
word to separate the number layers and to change the view.
E.g. -as reported- are exactly the numbers as they come from the external source
-detailed- are the most granular splitting of the -as reported- numbers
-projection- show the changes and includes the estimates to make a forecast

phrase_types.name: formula link
phrase_types.description: A term with the same name as a formula, because some values can be calculated and can nevertheless be overwritten

phrase_types.name: differentiator filler
phrase_types.description: these terms are used to fill up a differentiator list, so most likely the term linked will be named "other"

phrase_types.name: this
phrase_types.description: not sure, why this is needed

phrase_types.name: next
phrase_types.description: not sure, why this is needed

phrase_types.name: prior
phrase_types.description: not sure, why this is needed

phrase_types.name: scaling word percent
phrase_types.description: all words that represent percent

phrase_types.name: scaled measure
phrase_types.description: a combination of scaling and measure e.g. 100ml

phrase_types.name: math constant
phrase_types.description: A mathematical constant is a key number whose value is fixed by an unambiguous definition

phrase_types.name: measure divisor
phrase_types.description: a measure divisor like per year, per kg, ...

phrase_types.name: latest
phrase_types.description: to select the latest value by a time jump type e.g. latest year

phrase_types.name: key
phrase_types.description: force faster search and if two keys are connected with the verb is all child values are expected to be equal

phrase_types.name: information
phrase_types.description: this phrase is used mainly for information purpose and for the selection the program tries to another search without this phrase

phrase_types.name: hidden triple
phrase_types.description: this triple should not be included in selection list because the triple is identical with the from word and is only added to assign behavior to the word

phrase_types.name: hidden system
phrase_types.description: these words and triple are used e.g. for the system configuration and should not be included in standard selection list because the values are only internal and are shown in separate predefined views

phrase_types.name: group and select
phrase_types.description: words used to group and select other words to shorten the selection

phrase_types.name: symbol
phrase_types.description: words that indicate e.g. that a table column contains a symbol

phrase_types.name: rank
phrase_types.description: words that indicate e.g. that a table column contains a ranking number

phrase_types.name: ignore
phrase_types.description: words that indicate e.g. to set column names to be excluded from the import

formula_types.name: next
formula_types.description: time jump forward: replaces a time term with the next time term based on the verb follower. E.g. "2017" "next" would lead to use "2018"

formula_types.name: prior
formula_types.description: time jump backward: replaces a time term with the previous time term based on the verb follower. E.g. "2017" "next" would lead to use "2016"

formula_types.name: reversible
formula_types.description: a formula that can be included also in the reversed version e.g. "minute = second / 60" and "second = minute * 60"

formula_types.name: scaling
formula_types.description: a formula that adjust the scaling e.g. "million = one / 1000000"

formula_link_types.name: time period based
formula_link_types.description: increase needs to know for which time period the increase should be calculated

element_types.name: word
element_types.description: a reference to a word used to select values using "and"

element_types.name: formula
element_types.description: to select the results of another formula using the given context

element_types.name: triple
element_types.description: a reference to two predicate linked words used to select values using "and"

view_types.name: standard
view_types.description: the base display mask without additional functionalities

view_types.name: entry view
view_types.description: these masks are used for the zukunft.com entry page. If a totally new user opens zukunft.com the first time, he will see a random mask of this type.

view_types.name: edit
view_types.description: a edit mask that is used to change data

view_types.name: word default
view_types.description: a default mask for new words

view_types.name: details
view_types.description: to show the more details than the standard view

view_types.name: system
view_types.description: views used by the system that should only be adjusted by an admin

view_link_types.name: main word
view_link_types.description: use the main word as start for the view

view_link_types.name: selected word
view_link_types.description: use the selected words of the main view as a selector for the sub view

component_types.name: word selector
component_types.description: to select a word or triple

component_types.name: view selector
component_types.description: to select an existing mask e.g. to set the default view

component_types.name: text
component_types.description: simply to display a variable text

component_types.name: fixed word
component_types.description: show the user specific name of a word or a triple as a text

component_types.name: linked word
component_types.description: display a word and offer a link

component_types.name: formula results
component_types.description: show the results of a formula

component_types.name: word list up
component_types.description: Show a list of words related with a specified verb e.g. for the triple <Canton of Zurich> show the word <canton>, because they are linked with verb <is a>

component_types.name: word name
component_types.description: show the word name and give the user the possibility to change the word name

component_types.name: word list down
component_types.description: Show a list of words related with a specified verb e.g. for word <canton> list <Canton of Zurich> and others, because they are linked with verb <is a>

component_types.name: all relations
component_types.description: show the complete list of all relations

component_types.name: values related to
component_types.description: display all values that are related to a defined term

component_types.name: formulas
component_types.description: show all related formulas

component_types.name: word value list
component_types.description: A list of words with some key values e.g. a company list with the PE ratio

component_types.name: XML export
component_types.description: offer to configure and start the XML export of a phrase and all related words, numbers and formulas

component_types.name: CSV export
component_types.description: to define the main phrase, the column and row for the CSV export

component_types.name: JSON Export
component_types.description: To start or configure the JSON export

component_types.name: system form title
component_types.description: a form title only allowed for system views where the user can only change the order

component_types.name: system form hidden back stack
component_types.description: the hidden form field with the back stack only allowed for system views where the user can only change the order

component_types.name: system form confirm status
component_types.description: the hidden form field for the user confirm status only allowed for system views where the user can only change the order

component_types.name: show name
component_types.description: show the object name without link or form field

component_types.name: form field name
component_types.description: the form field for the name of a word or formula

component_types.name: form field description
component_types.description: the form field for the description of a word or formula

component_types.name: form select phrase
component_types.description: the form field to select a phrase

component_types.name: form select verb
component_types.description: the form field to select a verb

component_types.name: form field phrase type
component_types.description: the phrase type field in a form

component_types.name: form field share type
component_types.description: the share type field in a form

component_types.name: form field protection type
component_types.description: the protection type field in a form

component_types.name: button cancel
component_types.description: a button of a form to cancel the form action

component_types.name: button save
component_types.description: a button of a form to save the changes to the database

component_types.name: button delete
component_types.description: a button of a form to delete or exclude a word, triple, verb, value, formula view or component

component_types.name: form end
component_types.description: just to indicate that a form ends

component_types.name: row start
component_types.description: combine the next elements to one row

component_types.name: row right
component_types.description: combine the next elements to one row and align to the right

component_types.name: row end
component_types.description: just to indicate that a row ends

component_types.name: spreadsheet
component_types.description: spreadsheet that allows calculations by adding formulas to cells

component_types.name: term name
component_types.description: show the name of a word, triple, verb or formula and give the user the possibility to change the name

component_types.name: verb name
component_types.description: show the name of a verb and give the admin user the possibility to change the name

component_types.name: main value
component_types.description: show the main values related to the given term

component_types.name: system form select source type
component_types.description: the source type field in a form

component_types.name: system form select view
component_types.description: select the default view in a system mask

component_types.name: system form ref list
component_types.description: changeable list of reference

component_types.name: system form link list
component_types.description: changeable list of links

component_types.name: system usage
component_types.description: show where this object has been used

component_types.name: system change log
component_types.description: show the change log of this object

component_types.name: ranking parameters
component_types.description: the parameters used to calculate a ranking

component_types.name: ranking list
component_types.description: list sorted by the calculated ranking

component_types.name: related triples
component_types.description: display the triples where a verb is used

component_types.name: system form select reference type
component_types.description: selector for the reference type

component_types.name: system form select formula type
component_types.description: selector for the formula type

component_types.name: system form select view type
component_types.description: selector for the view type

component_types.name: system form select component type
component_types.description: selector for the component type

component_types.name: system form field formula text
component_types.description: the form field the formula expression

component_types.name: form field name
component_types.description: the form flag to set the formula to need all variables for a valid result

component_types.name: form field plural
component_types.description: fixed form field the language form plural

component_types.name: word results
component_types.description: show the results related to a word

component_types.name: triple name
component_types.description: show the name of a triple and give the admin user the possibility to change the name

component_types.name: source name
component_types.description: show the name of a source and give the admin user the possibility to change the name

component_types.name: reference name
component_types.description: show the name of a reference and give the admin user the possibility to change the name

component_types.name: language name
component_types.description: show the name of a language and give the admin user the possibility to change the name

component_types.name: results related to
component_types.description: display all results that are related to a defined term

component_types.name: expression
component_types.description: display expression of a formula

component_link_types.name: always
component_link_types.description: the component is always shown as it is

component_link_types.name: expression
component_link_types.description: the component is only shown if an expression is true

position_types.name: side
position_types.description: is right of the previous entry (or left for right to left languages)

share_types.name: public
share_types.description: value can be seen and used by everyone (default)

share_types.name: personal
share_types.description: value can be seen by everyone, but is linked to the user

share_types.name: group
share_types.description: only a closed group of users can seen and use the values

share_types.name: private
share_types.description: only the user itself can see und use the value

protection_types.name: user
protection_types.description: only users with a login and a confirmed email can take over the ownership

protection_types.name: admin
protection_types.description: only user with admin permission can take the ownership

protection_types.name: no change
protection_types.description: no change of the ownership is allowed

languages.name: English
languages.description: the system language, so each word must be unique for all users in this language

languages.name: UK English
languages.description: the users can use this (and the other) languages to create its own namespace. So one user may use "Zurich" in UK English for "Kanton Zurich" and another user may use "Zurich" in UK English for "Zurich AG".

language_forms.name: plural
language_forms.description: The noun denotes a quantity greater than the default quantity represented by that noun. This default quantity is most commonly one.

sys_log_statuus.name: new
sys_log_statuus.description: the error has just being logged and no one has yet looked at it

sys_log_statuus.name: assigned
sys_log_statuus.description: A developer is looking at the error.

sys_log_statuus.name: resolved
sys_log_statuus.description: the error is supposed to be corrected

sys_log_statuus.name: closed
sys_log_statuus.description: a second person (other than the developer) has confirmed that the problem is solved.

job_types.name: update value
job_types.description: if a value is updated all the depending results should be calculated again

job_types.name: add value
job_types.description: 1. check if used in formulas and if yes, create new formula results\r\n2. calculate the new formula results

job_types.name: exclude a value
job_types.description: check if used for a formula result and if yes either remove the formula result or update it

job_types.name: initial import
job_types.description: import the base configuration by a system user on initial setup

job_types.name: move to prime
job_types.description: move an often used phrase to the prime phrases by creating a clone with a low id and create new links and switch over and remove the old

job_types.name: move from prime
job_types.description: move a less often used phrase to the non prime phrases by creating a clone with a higher id and create new links and switch over and remove the old

job_types.name: create table
job_types.description: create a new table for values and results related to one phrase

job_types.name: clone table
job_types.description: copy the values and results related to one phrase to another pod

job_types.name: switch table
job_types.description: copy the values and results related to one phrase to another pod

job_types.name: sync table
job_types.description: force to sync a cloned phrase table with the original pod

job_types.name: remove clone
job_types.description: remove a cloned phrase table that is not used very often

job_types.name: delete table
job_types.description: remove a phrase table to replace it with a better fitting table

job_types.name: delete word
job_types.description: request to completely delete a word which can be done if there are no dependencies any more; may create requests to other users

job_types.name: delete triple
job_types.description: request to completely delete a triple which can be done if there are no dependencies any more; may create requests to other users

job_types.name: import source
job_types.description: import all references of a source

job_types.name: export
job_types.description: export data to an api or file

verbs.name: not set
verbs.description: no verb / predicate selected

verbs.name: is a
verbs.description: the main child to parent relation e.g. Zurich is a Canton. The reverse is valid and usually plural is used e.g. Cantons are Zurich, Bern, ...

verbs.name: is part of
verbs.description: if several similar term create different views to the same sum; E.g. Cash Flow Paper, Balance Sheet and Income statement are Financial Statements. Or sectors and Regions are different splittings

verbs.name: can be part of
verbs.description: if the assigment is optional in both directions e.g. a base unit can be a SI unit but not all SI units are base units

verbs.name: of
verbs.description: to narrow a selection e.g. the world population is usually the population of all humans

verbs.name: with
verbs.description: similar to 'is part of' but where the left phrase is expected to be several times the right phrase e.g. for comparing same by same: 1 hour with full load is the same as 2 hours with half load

verbs.name: is time jump for
verbs.description: is the default time jump for

verbs.name: is term jump for
verbs.description: is the default term jump for

verbs.name: term type needed
verbs.description: the formula needs the linked term type

verbs.name: is follower of
verbs.description: is follower of

verbs.name: uses
verbs.description: real use e.g. wind energy is used by a wind turbine

verbs.name: is measure type for
verbs.description: is the default measure type for

verbs.name: is an acronym for
verbs.description: is an acronym for

verbs.name: can be used as a differentiator for
verbs.description: similar to contains, but in a table view the row will not be shown if there is no corresponding value
verbs.plural: can be used as a differentiator for

verbs.name: can
verbs.description: to assign a behavior e.g. GDP can decline

verbs.name: can cause
verbs.description: there is a causal relation with a factor

verbs.name: can use
verbs.description: use indicates that a new result is created e.g. a turbine can use water or wind or any type of liquid or gas to convert energy

verbs.name: scaled by
verbs.description: to define the usual scaling e.g. for watt hours usually the scaling kilo (kWh) is used

verbs.name: per
verbs.description: to define the usual quotient e.g. meter per second is normally used not seconds per meter, that why the reverse name is empty

verbs.name: times
verbs.description: to multiply the two given phrases to one unit e.g. Joule times second (J⋅s) for the Plank constant

verbs.name: is selector for
verbs.description: used to group a selection list to make it shorter

verbs.name: is symbol for
verbs.description: is used as a symbol for

verbs.name: and
verbs.description: combine two phrases a a new phrase

verbs.name: on
verbs.description: to specify a subgroup e.g. taxes on income

system_views.name: Start view
system_views.description: A dynamic entry mask that initially shows a table for calculations with the biggest problems from the user point of view and suggestions what the user can do to solve these problems. Used also as fallback view.

components.name: Word
components.description: simply show the word or triple name

components.name: spreadsheet
components.description: changeable sheet with words, number and formulas

system_views.name: Add new word
system_views.description: Create a new word with all parameters e.g. the phrase type

components.name: system form title word add
components.description: show the language specific title for the system form to add a new word

components.name: system form hidden back stack
components.description: field that contains the stack for the undo actions

components.name: system form hidden confirm status
components.description: switch on that the form saving needs an extra confirm by the user
